Take action before Bush & Co. do!

Mar 14, 2003

It looks like the administration is gearing up for war without the UN. Although the February 15th Rally was a huge success, it is even more important to act now and make an even bigger show of our dissent than we did last time. There are a two large events planned next week. Please try to be at one of them!

Emergency Convergence On The White House To Stop The War On Iraq
with parallel actions in San Francisco & Los Angeles

Saturday March, 15 in Washington D.C.
See here for more information.

The United For Peace March for Freedom and Democracy

Saturday, 3/22 in New York City
See here for more information.
